replies.body:
It's not as good as alot of the pieces  here, but i drew a Camille of my own a couple of days ago. 

[if anyone cares](https://68.media.tumblr.com/002a64ebc6228719e90b0afe32a96e84/tumblr_oi3d31G9Gw1tyldx9o3_1280.png)
I love your piece! Thank you so much for sharing it. =) I really like the feeling of her scaling the wall/building.
you have no idea how happy this comment made me. q-q

"It's not as good-"

Stop right there. Your submission is actually on par with most of the pieces showcased here. I admire it truly, and you should feel proud of yourself for creating such a grand submission my friend.
I think your piece is just as good, if not better than some of the work here!
It's not bad, tbh. Captures her as the stalker of the night.
That looks very nice!
I'm keeping this. This is my new phone wallpaper.
You guys are all so sweet. thank you! q-q
i do
nice work!!!

Um excuse me but she is an old lady and these art depict her to young.{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}

Important Distinction.
One even looked kinda like a robo-baby
Vonnabeee's is probably my favorite out of the bunch ... still, super talented artists all the same and I loved each submission dearly. Thank you Riot for showcasing these to us!
Great job! I particularly love Hozure's Camille, as it captures her frozen youth and aristocratic age quite well.
It's almost scary how much Susan-Kim's piece looks like Jennifer Lawrence.
